thread_title: UI Component Library Pipeline Completion and Expansion

1_narrative.title: Narrative & Context
items: Continuation of an overnight session from 2026-02-19 into a morning wrap-up focused on the UI Component Library project (PIL_07_UI_LIBRARY).

The session completed the processing of all 40 UI kits through a 5-phase pipeline, resolving failures for three kits (Strivo, Travel Planner Light, Untitled UI Pro) and adding two new kits (Core Dashboard Builder, Tuskter CRM).
Final library statistics were compiled, and a Figma rate limit was encountered, blocking PNG exports for one kit.

2_objectives.title: Objectives
items: Complete the 5-phase pipeline for all UI kits in the library.
Fix kits that failed during the batch run.
Expand the library by adding new kits.
Compile final library numbers and update all project state files.

3_success_criteria.title: Success Criteria
items: All 40 kits processed through the pipeline and reflected in KIT_INDEX, CORE_LAYOUT_LIBRARY.json, and BATCH_PIPELINE_CHECKPOINT.json.
Failed kits (Strivo, Travel Planner Light, Untitled UI Pro) successfully resolved and their data extracted.
New kits (Core Dashboard Builder, Tuskter CRM) added to the library.
Accurate final counts for screens, templates, and PNGs documented.

4_decisions.title: Decisions & Rules
items: Adopt a section-by-section fetching strategy for Figma files that timeout on a full fetch.
Permanently remove the Fitness Pro kit from all records (user decision).
Add Core Dashboard Builder and Tuskter CRM kits to expand the library.

5_sops.title: SOPs / Workflows
items: 5-phase pipeline for processing UI kits.
Section-by-section fetch (e.g., Dashboard, Messages, Tasks, Events, Projects, Settings, Sign up & Onboarding, Integrations) as a fallback for connection errors.
Targeted node extraction for files returning HTTP 400 (file too large).

6_scripts.title: Scripts / Commands
items: 03_CORE_ENGINE/SCRIPTS/strivo_phases.py — Generic Phase 2-5 runner that accepts a kit name as a CLI argument.
03_CORE_ENGINE/SCRIPTS/core_dashboard_phases.py — Phase 2-5 runner for Core Dashboard Builder with a light-only filter.

7_inputs_outputs.title: Inputs & Outputs
items: Inputs: Original list of kits (38), plus 2 new kits (Core Dashboard Builder, Tuskter CRM). Figma file IDs (e.g., CiyOckN4TAM0u6mfSsl4QI, t5IRTNkDbSGsiLrtawggae).

Outputs: For each kit: FIGMA_FULL.json, SCREEN_ANALYSIS.json, LAYOUT_TEMPLATES.json, PNG screenshots. Updated master files: CORE_LAYOUT_LIBRARY.json, BATCH_PIPELINE_CHECKPOINT.json, KIT_INDEX.json, PROJECT_STATE.md.
Final Outputs: 40 kits, 3,633 screens analyzed, 1,785 unique templates identified, ~1,696 PNGs exported (89 pending for Finder).

8_missteps.title: Missteps / Errors / Risks
items: Strivo and Travel Planner Light kits failed due to connection errors on full fetch.
Untitled UI Pro kit failed with HTTP 400 (file too large).
Figma rate limit encountered for the Finder kit, blocking PNG export with a Retry-After header of ~4 days.

9_blockers.title: Blockers
items: Figma rate limit blocking PNG export for the Finder kit (89 PNGs pending). Retry possible after Feb 23.

10_status.title: Status
items: Pipeline for 40 kits is complete.
PNG export for the Finder kit is blocked (HIGH priority).
Library data is ready for next processing steps (PRD matcher, DB import).

11_progress.title: Progress Markers
items: Completed all 40 kits through the 5-phase pipeline (started with 5 kits on Feb 19).
Fixed 3 failed kits (Strivo, Travel Planner Light, Untitled UI Pro).
Added 2 new kits (Core Dashboard Builder, Tuskter CRM).
Removed Fitness Pro kit.
Updated all master index and state files.

12_refinements.title: Refinements
items: Implemented section-by-section fetching as a solution for connection errors.
Implemented targeted node extraction for large files causing HTTP 400.
Created generic and kit-specific phase runner scripts for automation.

13_dependencies.title: Dependencies
items: Figma API for data fetching and PNG export.
Existing pipeline scripts and project structure.
PostgreSQL for planned structured JSON import.
PRD matcher for next analysis step.

14_entities.title: Entity Maps
items: Kits: Strivo, Travel Planner Light, Untitled UI Pro, Core Dashboard Builder, Tuskter CRM, Finder, Fitness Pro (removed).
Files: FIGMA_FULL.json, SCREEN_ANALYSIS.json, LAYOUT_TEMPLATES.json, CORE_LAYOUT_LIBRARY.json, BATCH_PIPELINE_CHECKPOINT.json, KIT_INDEX.json, PROJECT_STATE.md.
Scripts: strivo_phases.py, core_dashboard_phases.py.
Project: PIL_07_UI_LIBRARY / PRJ_UI_Component_Library.

15_glossary.title: Glossary
items: Kits: A collection of UI screens/templates from a Figma file.
5-phase pipeline: The processing workflow for a kit.
Templates: Unique layout structures identified from screens.
PNGs: Rendered screenshot exports of screens.

16_future.title: Future
items: Re-run PRD matcher with the updated 40 kits (HIGH priority).
PostgreSQL import of structured JSON (MEDIUM priority).
Build a visual component browser (MEDIUM priority).

17_pending.title: Pending
items: Export of 89 PNGs for the Finder kit, pending Figma rate limit lift after Feb 23.

19_meta.title: Meta-Observations
items: Batch processing benefits from having fallback strategies (section fetch, node extraction) for API failures.
Keeping master index files (KIT_INDEX, CHECKPOINT) synchronized is critical for tracking pipeline state.
Rate limits are a predictable blocker for bulk export operations; scheduling retries is necessary.

20_assets.title: Reusable Assets
items: Generic phase runner script (strivo_phases.py) for processing any kit.
Section-by-section fetching strategy for handling Figma connection timeouts.
Targeted node extraction method for large Figma files.
Updated library index and checkpoint JSON schemas.

summary: This session completed the 5-phase pipeline for 40 UI component kits, resolving fetch errors for three kits via section-based and targeted extraction methods, and adding two new kits. The library now contains 3,633 screens and 1,785 templates, with PNG exports for one kit pending due to a Figma rate limit.
